= Introduction =
 このプロジェクトでは以下のようなリクエストフロー(各階層の呼び名)と定義します。
  # HTML DOM _(View Layer)_
    # JSP / XHTML
  # HTTP post / get _(Request Layer)_
    # HTML Form Submit / URL direct / javascript-Ajax submit
  # Web Application _(Presentation Layer)_
    # Servlet Filter
    # Web Application Interceptor
    # Web Application Action
  # Web Service _(Interface Layer)_
    # Servlet filter
    # Web Service Interceptor
    # Web Service Operation
  # Business Service _(Business Process Layer)_
    # Business Service Interceptor
    # Business Service
  # Business Component _(Business Logic Layer)_
    # Business Component Interceptor
    # Business Component
  # Data Access Object _(Persistence Layer)_
    # O/R Mapper
    # DAO
  # Database / File _(Model Layer)_
